comments: I don\'t know what we would have done without him in the Fashion Dept. @ Marist when we were there. Great teacher and advisor!

a lot of fun, an awesome cad teacher. i had kramer for cad 1 and it was awful, i changed teacher for the second semester and got 2 letter grades higher, the difference was amazing! he would tell you what you needed to work on and how to fix it rather than just tell you it sucked, very helpful and fun
He has so many great ideas and he really cares about his students and their work.
